attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There is a serious lack of allotments throughout the country and demand is on the increase.
People want to grow their own produce for a number of reasons such as health, environmental issues etc. But the most important reason is our children’s health.
We appreciate the need for affordable housing but surely land could be set aside for allotments.
I suggest that new allotments are set up with a portion of the site designated to a local school.
Benefits:-
Fresh produce for pupils.
Pupils learn about healthy living.
Interaction with the other plot holders creating a community spirit.
Allotmenteers would love to help teach young people about growing vegetables.
Interaction between generations and hopefully create respect.
Parents growing vegetables in the gardens due to pressure from their youngsters, promoting healthy living and a reduction in obesity.
